title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.60 - Attendants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.60 - Attendants

State Regulations

The driver, operator or attendant of any refueling
service vehicle shall be in attendance when the vehicle is fueling or refueling
an aircraft and shall have, under his control, the delivery of fuel through the
use of approved fueling control devices designed to shut-off automatically at
the hydrant outlet. Under these controlled conditions, a single driver or
operator may perform the complete servicing of any aircraft provided the
distance between the automatic shut-off device and the mechanism it controls
shall not exceed 100 feet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
